title: General meta-data container contract

body:
Hello @3rdstage .

Before pushing a particular implementation, it would make a lot of sens to standardize the interface (in an ERC) and get feedback/support for it.
I remember version 2 of [ERC725](https://github.com/ERC725Alliance/erc725/blob/master/docs/ERC-725.md) (after it was reworked at ETHCC 2018) focused on metadata through `setData` and `getData`. [ENS resolvers](https://docs.ens.domains/contract-api-reference/publicresolver) also support generic text records. 

Maybe you this discussion should happen on the [ethmagician's forum](https://ethereum-magicians.org/)
I agree this looks like something that should be standardized and that a better place for discussion is the Ethereum Magicians forum.
Recommend to close issue. There's too much to say about this proposal that I don't want to put here.
